name: Planet E861
description:
This is a prototype for a game I'm currently working on. I'm planning to completely rebuild it, and make a multiplayer version.

Extract the planet's natural resources, and create products to sell to the market.

The story:
Humanities demands for resources is growing, and Earth's natural elements are quickly being depleted. Our scientists have found a cheaper and faster solution that could fulfil the ever-expanding demand for resources, and possibly for eternity.
The birth of inter-dimensional mining could mean a very profitable future for the company. And we grant you the opportunity to assist us with our business.
